name: Perchta
description:
This game is about Perchta, who haunts an alpine village.
The game is still in development, but playable.

To play you should only need the .zip file from the link. (This game requires the "uplogic" module to be installed in the executing python installation, that can be done via a button in the logic node addon preferences easily)

There's some settings that can be adjusted by modifying the settings.json file in Data/Scripts

You might need to run "scene.blend" through the UPBGE for now to play it if you don't have python installed on your machine.

More screenshots will follow.

Team:

Leopold Auersperg
